txt.en: 'The crabs bother the workers and get in the way of our efforts to rebuild people's homes across Dor-en-Ernil.\n\n'While we can waste away swinging sword and spear at these creatures endlessly, we need a deterrent and perhaps a way to potentially harvest them, but at least my new traps should be able to keep them at bay!'
You have set up plenty of traps along the shores of Dor-en-Ernil. You should tell Remhir.\n\nRemhir can be found in Barad Rill.
Talk to Remhir in Barad Rill
Remhir may have a solution to the fast encroachment of the crabs along Dor-en-Ernil's shores.
'Thank you! Now we can teach those crabs what for!\n\n'Perhaps we'll see their numbers dwindle in Dor-en-Ernil. I remain optimistic.'
Set up traps along the shore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Remhir has asked you to set up crab traps along Dor-en-Ernil's shores.
